body_html:
What am I supposed to use now instead of the below? Thanks!

auto tensor = m_workspace.GetBlob ("input")->GetMutable < TensorCPU > ();

I am getting an error:

/usr/local/include/caffe2/core/blob.h:127:5: error: static_assert failed "GetMutable can't be called with non-default-constructible types. Try using specialized methods"

body:
What am I supposed to use now instead of the below? Thanks!

auto tensor = m_workspace.GetBlob ("input")->GetMutable < TensorCPU > ();

I am getting an error:

/usr/local/include/caffe2/core/blob.h:127:5: error: static_assert failed "GetMutable can't be called with non-default-constructible types. Try using specialized methods"
